DOC.brief_summary: Stenosis bilio-biliary anastomosis occur 30 % patient orthotopic liver transplantation . This study compare endoscopic treatment implantation multiple plastic endoprostheses vs. use removable , cover self-expandable metal stent ( cSEMS ) .
DOC.brief_title: cSEMS vs. NEPS Stricture Biliary Anastomosis After Liver Transplantation
DOC.criteria: postOLT stenosis biliobiliary anastomotic nonanastomotic stricture stent implatation technically feasible
